name: Defeating User Built Dungeon
description:
Made for -

r/roguelikedev Complete Tutorial 2021

Controls -

WASD/Arrows - Move

Period (.) - Wait

You are witnessing an experiment in game-making, I wanted to make a moddable roguelike and was already making an RTS for another jam, so this was the idea. If it all works, you can drag a text file onto the game and play the level, but that doesn't work yet, stay tuned!
